replies.bodyText: I agree with that. Otherwise the concept of leaf will be confusing.
replies.author: Alima777

timeline.message:
IOTDB-750 Allow SubDevices in IoTDB.

- Rename LeafMNode to MeasurementMNode and fix IT to show that a Measurement can now also have sub-measurements in the MTree.
